attributes.action: Welcome President Trump to the UK
attributes.additional_details: Like our Prime Minister, President Trump has the interests of working people at the heart of his policies. Financial security is just one of the securities any Country needs to be sustainable and between the UK and the USA, our trade together is worth £150 billion a year. Plus, the USA is the UKs single biggest inward source of income with £1 Trillion Dollars invested in each others economies (President Donald J. Trump, Facebook, January 27 at 6:11pm).
attributes.background:
If we as a Country exclude just one person based on their political stance, we will no longer a democratic Country. Along with this, we can not afford to cut the ties with the United States. 

Parliament needs to ensure the visit goes ahead as planned and as requested by our Queen.
